clues.text: Spanish explorers are believed to have visited Mobile Bay in this state back in 1519

Common name given to the reindeer of North America

rounds.text: On Nov. 15, 1961 JFK suspended the 8-hour workday at this agency, saying its work needed to proceed "with all possible speed"
